content:
Diagnosis:		Clear cell renal cell carcinoma

Management:		12 Apr 2024 Left partial nephrectomy

Histology:		pT1b (4.5cm) clear cell renal cell carcinoma, Fuhrman grade 2, margins clear
			PD-L1 CPS 10
			Stage pT1bN0M0

Current Situation:	Post-operative follow-up

[redacted name] was reviewed in the Uro-oncology clinic today following his recent left partial nephrectomy. His post-operative recovery has been uncomplicated with good wound healing. His baseline renal function remains stable with creatinine 98 umol/L. CT chest/abdomen/pelvis performed on 2 May 2024 shows expected post-surgical changes with no evidence of residual or metastatic disease. Given the favourable histological features and stage, we have discussed that active surveillance is appropriate. The plan is for 3-monthly clinical review with regular cross-sectional imaging as per our surveillance protocol. The first follow-up CT scan will be arranged for 3 months' time. We will see him back in clinic with these results.

primary_cancer.histopathology_status: clear cell renal cell carcinoma, Fuhrman grade 2, 4.5cm, margins clear

cancer_timeline.value: CT chest/abdomen/pelvis shows expected post-surgical changes with no evidence of residual or metastatic disease
Stable renal function with creatinine 98 umol/L

status_updates.value: Recently diagnosed clear cell renal cell carcinoma treated with partial nephrectomy. Uncomplicated post-operative recovery with no evidence of residual disease.
For active surveillance given favourable histological features and stage
Clinical review in 3 months with imaging results
